text: Nathan Richard Nusbaum (June 8, 1913 - December 11, 2000), known as N. Richard Nash, was an American writer and dramatist. He was best known for writing Broadway shows, including The Rainmaker. ==Other websites== * *N. Richard Nash Papers at the Wisconsin Center for Film and Theater Research *Britannica article on Nash *Article on Nash and The Rainmaker *AllMovie profile of Nash Category:1913 births Category:2000 deaths Category:American playwrights Category:American novelists Category:Writers from Philadelphia
title: N. Richard Nash
